courseDescription:
The total cost of a cyber breach can be up to 100 Billion US dollars. It is predicted that cybercrime damage costs will hit 8 trillion US dollars annually by 2025. Crypto crime exceeded 14 billion US dollars in 2021 alone. Most of these projects were based on blockchain and had common security flaws. You could fix these cyber security loopholes or at least minimise the attack surface with blockchain security awareness.

The rapid growth and adoption of blockchain technology have opened doors for many innovative solutions to make our life easier. However, despite these securities, criminals find ways to breach your systems. In addition, compromised blockchain projects, use cases, proof-of-concept or buggy security issues can be expensive to address (time, resources and cost).

This course will give you a foundational understanding of blockchain security to protect your projects and enterprises from these attacks. You will be able to analyse and solve common security issues related to blockchain security. CBSE (Certified Blockchain Security Examiner) Certification Level -1 aims to cover all known aspects of blockchain security existing in the blockchain through Alison's free online examiner course. Delve into the world of cyber security and take this course today!
